text: Abo bangakholwayo bathi: “IYure ayiyi kusifikela thina.” Yithi wena: “Ewe! Ndifunga ngeNkosi yam, Iza kunifikela. (UAllâh) nguMazi wokungabonwayo.” Akukho nesuntswana elingakanani na elisitheleyo kuYe emazulwini okanye emhlabeni, enokuba lingalincinane na okanye libe likhulu kangakanani na, (libhaliwe) eNcwadini ecacileyo
